author: {'steamid': '76561197972996364', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1514315066}
review: The concept is incredibly simple and incredibly fun.  I love how each control stick moves gun and spy individually, and how you can play a great deal of mind games with your opponents using this mechanic.  One of those dead simple games you could play again and again with varying groups because of how super quick it plays.

author: {'steamid': '76561198995387103', 'num_games_owned': 6510, 'num_reviews': 3379, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1687297027}
review:
Ach, chinese need. 成就，中文必要。

202211下，t a o宝，支付宝红包，杉果，本平台，本平台充值折扣掉卡，indie gala，fanatical，humble，daily indie game，loot boy，它处自定义包入的本体约3元。爱人如己，目前就这，看以后追评。有中文的游戏请耐心自研体验乐趣，攻略指南尽量不用。不建议使用外挂，插件，作弊之类的，游戏都要这样搞，那现实里那更是如此了。兄弟萌，强烈建议不要第三方平台的小店买y u额，通过饰品等挂steam市场转的，高概率red信乃至封号，且行且珍惜。

author: {'steamid': '76561197993208673', 'num_games_owned': 1794, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1568916594}
review:
UPDATE: So six months after my review the developers added a single player mode, and today (a year later) I finally gave it a shot. Unfortunately the second mission appears to be broken; In it you're tasked with protecting someone using a sniper rifle, however the scope only moves at one speed and that speed is slower then the target walks, thus making it impossible to keep up with and protect them. As such, just like with my initial review, I do not recommend this game.

OLD REVIEW: Store page lies; there is no single player mode, not even a basic one.
I even tried opting into the beta version of the game to see if it was in that, but no luck. This game is multiplayer only.
developer_response:
Hi PolyHertz,

Thank you for the opinion and we have some news that might interest you.

Last month we release a new version of the game that, among many things, have a brand new single player mode.

This version also brings new characters, new gadgets, new scenarios and a lot of fixes. And it's totally free if already have the game.

Hope you enjoy,
Alexandre Haru
Marketing - Seize Studios

author: {'steamid': '76561198132748965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 346, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1504340059}
review:
看起来像Party Hard，其实玩法类似Thief Town，看了评论区才发现还有个早两年发布的Hidden in Plain Sight和这个游戏几乎一模一样，还多几个模式，那么我推荐这款游戏的理由是什么？画面好那么一丢丢？

游戏玩法是这样的：一边控制一个间谍在Party里收集证据（即站在固定地点附近读条），一边控制一个狙击镜寻找其他玩家的间谍并击毙他们（你也可以打死自己）。每局开始前，玩家要在场上所有人物中选一个当自己的间谍，这个阶段要小心基友偷看你的手柄，如果你和基友特别默契，也可能出现选了同一个角色不得不重选的情况。选好之后，牢记自己间谍的样子和位置，因为一旦开始游戏，屏幕上除了狙击镜的视野就是一片黑暗。为了避免引起对手注意，间谍大部分时间是在摸黑走路，如果对地形和自己的位置不熟悉，很容易出现卡墙角艹墙的情况，然而NPC是不会艹墙的，所以你艹墙的时候被基友抓包的话，嗯，你懂的。一局结束后，玩家可以用在游戏中获得的金钱购买随机上架的几种道具，有烟雾弹、照明弹、抵消一次子弹的木桩、加快间谍移动速度的我也不知道是什么东西等，以供下局使用。道具种类还是比较丰富的。

游戏最大的问题是玩法太单一，只有一种模式，地图目前来看也只有6张。小惊喜：其中一张是君临城的红堡，中间很明显是铁王座，旁边站着个酷似乔大帝的金发小国王，再旁边的乐队成员很像血婚现场弗雷家那群戴皮帽子的家伙——所以我把他们都杀了。嗯，我好像找到了推荐这款游戏的理由。

+不错的像素画风
+舒适的操作手感
+-人越多越好玩，一个人没法玩
--内容单薄

总评：5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1504235301}
review:
Tags: Combat Arena & Smashbroesque
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Play Hidden in Plain Sight instead it is the exact same concept with better and more game modes
http://store.steampowered.com/app/303590/Hidden_in_Plain_Sight/

The problem with Party Saboteurs is that there is only one mode really and there are no "tells". You can rarely if ever see a player betray themselves. Whereas hidden in plain sight will allow poison daggers with delayed death, or have you swing a large sword and use a smoke bomb after.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078044177', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1509793804}
review: The game is fun and all but it is very buggy. Gameplay is fine, but whenever a round is over from assassinating all the spies or collecting all the evidence, points were not awarded. The controller also continues to rumbles if you stop collecting evidence mid way. Has potential to be good but the bugs make it annoying.
developer_response:
Hi Jinseng,

Last month we released a new version of the game called Party Saboteurs: After Party. This huge update fixes a lot of the issues you mentioned. 

Besides that, this versions brings a lot of new content. New characters, new gadgets, new scenarios and a story mode for one player.

Hope you enjoy,
Alexandre Haru
Marketing - Seize Studios

author: {'steamid': '76561197998177676', 'num_games_owned': 4911, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1493140778}
review:

developer_response:
Hi Hassat Hunter,


We have some great news about the game that might interest you.

First of all, about the issue with the controllers, the past version of the game required at least one controller connected, because the game was only multiplayer, but we think this was not clearly explained. Sorry for that.

The great news are that we released a new version of the game last month. It brings a lot of new content, like new characters, new scenarios, new gadgets, a lot of fixes and a STORY MODE for one player.

And it's totally free for those who already have the game.

Hope you enjoy,
Alexandre Haru
Marketing - Seize Studios

author: {'steamid': '76561197999747491', 'num_games_owned': 1568, 'num_reviews': 449, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1486239508}
review:
Kein Spiel für stundenlange Unterhaltung. Aber sehr spassig für zwischendurch, um mit mindestens einem Mitspieler ein wenig Spass zu haben. Das Konzept ist cool und wirklich unterhaltsam. Leider mangelt es sehr schnell an der Abwechslung. Hier wäre noch einiges drin.
Zudem ist die Erklärung des Spiels äusserst mangelhaft, so dass man zuerst einmal einige Zeit braucht um die Spielmechaniken oder die Wirkungen von Gadgets überhaupt zu verstehen.
Der Vollpreis ist für was man im Moment bekommt noch zu hoch (es sei denn da käme noch mehr Content). Aber wer gerne ein kurzweiliges, spassiges Mehrspielerspiel ausprobieren möchte und mindestens einen Spielpartner dafür zuhause hat, der darfim im Sale oder mal wieder in einem Bundle bedenkenlos zuschlagen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027455730', 'num_games_owned': 452, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1539565385}
review: This game does not work at all unless you have a controller. Even if you are lucky enough to figure out that a keyboard's Z is analogous to a controller's A button, you still can't play the game with just a keyboard and mouse. As soon as you try to enter a game mode, it says "Connect a Controller" and from there you're stuck. It doesn't say anywhere that this is not playable on a regular PC and is pretty much a rip off for that reason. There are also a good number of crashes that happen.
developer_response:
Hi Nasal Cannula,

Last month Party Saboteurs received a huge updated, and it fixes all the problems you had. Sorry for the late, but it it's finally here.

The new version of the game is called Party Saboteurs: After Party and brings, not only fixes, but a lot of new content, including a Single Player mode.

New characters, new gadgets, new scenarios and the above mentioned story mode are all available for free ir you already got the game.

Hope you enjoy,
Alexandre Haru
Marketing - Seize Studios

developer_response:
Hi Illisia,

We have some great news that might interest you.

First of all, sorry for the past issue with the controllers. The good thing is that last month we released a new version of the game, called Party Saboteurs: After Party.

This version brings a lot of fixes, including this controllers one. The game now have a story mode, that can be played with keyboard+mouse or a trackpad. The multiplayer also supports keyboard + others controllers to gather up to 4 people locally.

This update also brings new characters, new gadgets, new scenarios and it's totally free if you already have the game.

Hope you enjoy,
Alexandre Galdino
Marketing - Seize Studios

author: {'steamid': '76561198202473004', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1462693153}
review:
Desenvolvido pelo estúdio The Glitch Factory, "Party Saboteurs" é um divertido jogo de multi-player local, no qual você controla um espião e um sniper.

O jogo te dará objetivos para você realizar com o espião, enquanto tenta descobrir quem é o espião inimigo, para poder matá-lo com seu atirador. A ideia é inovadora e como o jogo a implementa é seu grande ponto positivo.

O desafio do jogo é realizar as duas ações ao mesmo tempo. E a grande sacada está no fato de que, mesmo sendo multiplayer local, você não sabe qual é o espião inimigo. Os outros players só sabem pois podem controlá-los, pois não há indicador de quem é quem. 

Então além de manter o seu espião vivo, realizando as tarefas sem ser detectados pelos outros players, você precisa identificá-los. O que pode se tornar um verdadeiro chaos se for jogado com até 4 pessoas.

O jogo tem lindos gráficos pixelados e uma boa trilha sonora de ocasião.

Infelizmente, o jogo precisa de melhoras. Achei precipitado terem lançado sem multiplayer on-line. Ele já é muito divertido localmente, mas com certeza atingiria um público maior se já viesse com o modo on-line. Também, ele só pode ser jogado por controle. Para um jogo de PC, me parece estranho que não haja opção para jogar com teclado e mouse.

No fim, é um jogo promissor, divertido, mas com escolhas questionáveis que poderão limitar e ofuscar seu potencial.

[h1][b]Prós:[/b][/h1]

- Ideia inovadora muito bem implementada, praticamente cria um gênero
- Divertido para se jogar localmente com amigos
- Lindos gráficos e ótima trilha sonora

[h1][b]Contras:[/b][/h1]

- Só pode ser jogado com controle
- Não há modo on-line (ainda que eu tenha sido avisado disso)

[h1][b]Nota final:[/b][/h1]

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198078652186', 'num_games_owned': 1361, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1477061855}
review: Интерecный многопользовательный режим. Нужно управлять одновременно шпионом и снайпером. Немного напрягает управление. Вроде игра неплохая.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116139047', 'num_games_owned': 1076, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1477134589}
review:
На первый взгляд, по видео и скриншотам, игра не кажется привлекательно (разве что для ярых любителей инди). Но, один раз попробовав сыграть в неё, вам будет сложно отказаться сделать это снова! Она буквально затягивает)))

Довольно простая идея: "шпионы" пытаются подсыпать в  эксклюзивный коктейль некий порошок, чтобы испортить вкус, а "снайперы" должны вовремя вычислить и предотвратить действия этих шпионов. Мультиплеерная игра, веселая музыка, атмосферность, экшн!

Я даже не ожидал столького от игры... 
Попробуйте и вы! ^_^

author: {'steamid': '76561197960796067', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1607145586}
review:
This game is a great party game.  We only tried it locally with a few xbox 360 controllers hooked up.  It looks like they've enabled keyboard controls but we didn't try them.

Pro:
-Simple gameplay
-Multiple methods to winning
-Penalty for shooting the wrong person is justified
-Fairly easy to blend in

Cons:
-You may peak your mics if playing with friends
-You may not like your friends much after playing
-Only 4 levels so far
-Would like to see more hidden things (like if you put your crosshairs on a cat)

author: {'steamid': '76561197991140811', 'num_games_owned': 5786, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1477172549}
review:
[b]Party Saboteurs is a local multiplayer game (with online multiplayer coming) where you control both a spy whose aim is to sabotage a dinner party, and a sniper who is trying to stop rival spies. [/b]

I've been on a bit of a local co-op streak lately and Party Saboteurs caught my eye as it seems like something that veered away from the usual party brawler and into something a bit more like Monaco or Dollar Dash (both of which focused on objectives over combat).
Despite being in Early Access the game is already showing some great promise. There is a solid foundation idea to the game: you must sabotage a dinner party without being found and killed WHILST trying to stop your rivals from doing the same. Though lacking in content in the way of maps and power-ups right now we are finding the game very, very fun and looking forward to trying it with more than just two of us.

The game currently has local co-op games modes and challenges with multiplayer being implemented at a later date. The local co-op game mode supports 2 to 4 players and allows up to 8 if you're willing to share each controller with another person but I think this makes the game unenjoyable as controlling both your vision and movement is integral to the gameplay. Once the game starts you can all (discreetly) choose which player you'd like to play as this turn and once everyone is ready it begins. You all have a large cross-hair which you control with one half of the controller and anything outside of the cross-hairs is completely black; the other half of your controller controls your spy which you'll use to activate objectives. Those objectives are dotted around the map and you must get to them and activate them without the others players working out which character you control and consequently sniping you right in the head. This requires multitasking as you have a lot to watch at once without giving yourself away.

There are other NPCs walking around and the AI seems pretty solid so far, I have killed many, many innocents because I genuinely thought they were my Player 2. In fact there was a moment whilst playing when we BOTH tried to kill the same poor woman who we believed to be the other player...which she wasn't. I found them to mimic the way real players may play with things such as heading towards objectives over time, short pauses in movements then continuing and movement that seemed to blend in or be completely random. It makes the game a lot more challenging and way more fun than if it was easy to work out who was a bot and who wasn't. You'll also find a few power-ups (though not that many right now) that I've seen so far that you can shoot to collect such as a smoke bomb which you can use when you need to as either a distraction or a decoy or another that'll auto complete an objective for you.

The sound is something I want to mention; I love the music in the game. Each stage has different music which you can see being played by the band at the party. Though a small part of the game not many people would notice, I loved this feature a lot. There are three musicians (that won't start playing their instrument until it actually starts in the soundtrack) per stage each playing a piece of the music you hear whilst playing. You can kill them off one by one and the musical instrument that they are playing will stop until all three are dead and there is just musical silence. There are so many developers that ignore the small little things like that but I think this really does add something to the game. The conversational chatter in the background also enhances the feeling that you're actually at a social gathering/party making the whole experience ten times better.

A few suggestions would be to maybe add a harder game mode where there are things like as more innocents are killed there is more panic among the other guests making them move more or possibly faster or maybe even introducing things like detectives you must avoid in order to not be arrested. It would also be good to see different types of objectives, maybe some that require more than just one action, such as taking an item to another part of the room aka poison into a wine decanter or removing files from a desk; just something to make your objectives feel a little more meaningful. 

The only cons I can really find to the game so far is the lack of stages and power ups which I hope will be added whilst the game is in Early Access. The other issue is the time it takes to capture an objective. We both found it to be a little too long as it's made very clear to the other players by the large circle that fills around your cross hair that you are taking an objective at that time. It makes it very easy to just watch the other players cross hairs whilst having your own positioned between objectives then quickly check them all when you see it for quick and easy kills without using your spy at all. It might also be nice to add some larger maps with more NPC's wandering around for those who want a little more of a challenge.

[b]Overall I can see so much potential to this game and I can't wait to see it fully fleshed out and completed when it's Early Access is over. The price point is perfect at around $2.50 per player (local multiplayer) and for what you get it's great value. This is one of the most enjoyable local multiplayer games I've played in a long, long time and one that's well worth keeping an eye out for in it's completed form.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198082118649', 'num_games_owned': 11676, 'num_reviews': 463, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1477263197}
review:
В игре на данный момент есть только режим испытаний и локальный мультиплеер (нужно несколько контроллеров насколько я понимаю).


Веселая игра с режимом испытания и мультиплеером,с простым управлением,позитивной музыкой.В режиме испытаний очень даже интересно играть,так же в режиме испытаний паралельно присутствуют задания;связаные с нахождением и убийством шпиона и другими схожими подзаданийми,достаточно интересно на первый взгляд,ждем прирост игроков в игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091613577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1460446513}
review: While this game looks quite good, i feel a bit mislead by the store page not really specifying that the game (for now) is almost solely for game controller.  If there is anyway to play this with keyboard and mouse i would gladly give it another go, but as is, i just cant recommend it.  Really hoping this issue might get fixed sometime soon, like i said, I'll be happy to give it another go.
developer_response:
Hi scabacious,

If you still want to give another try on Party Saboteurs, that's the best time.

Last month we released a huge update for the game. The new version called Party Saboteurs: After Party brings a lot of new content, like new characters, new scenarios, new gadgets, a lot of fixes and a Story Mode for one player.

The controllers support was also updated. You can play with keyboad+mouse or a trackpad on single or multiplayer mode.

We put a lot of work and love on this updated for people like you.

Alexandre Haru
Marketing - Seize Studios

author: {'steamid': '76561198022651802', 'num_games_owned': 400, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1460949976}
review:
还真是早期版本……基本没游戏性。估计是绿光上放太久了，扔个演示版本来吊一下胃口。
现在能玩的就只有11个基础教学关，基本就是告诉你怎么操作的那种。如果有俩控制器的话（键盘+手柄应该也行）貌似可以本地合作。

操作模式对手柄比较友好，对键盘就一般般了。就目前的样子来看这游戏会比较考验左右脑协同，因为要同时用方向键控制两组目标。先挂个评价在这里，等完成度高一点再回来。

补一个按键映射：
RT - Ctrl
LT - Space
A - Z
B - B
Y - Y
左摇杆 - WASD
右摇杆 - 上下左右
Start - Enter
键盘还有个E键是狙击追踪主角，不知道对应手柄哪个键。

author: {'steamid': '76561198080114242', 'num_games_owned': 3604, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1460237999}
review:
В игре на данный момент есть только режим испытаний и локальный мультиплеер (нужно несколько контроллеров насколько я понимаю).

В режиме испытаний необходимо паралельно выполнять несколько действий: убить шпиона и похитить документы. Вся проблема в том, что сделать это нужно за короткий промежуток времни, а значит приходится делать это практически одновременно. При помощи клавиатуры играть достаточно сложно. Я осилил на данный момент только 8 испытаний.

На первый взгляд игра выглядит интересно, хотя я думаю с живыми игроками играть будет интереснее.

Управление для тех кто также как и я будет пытаться играть склавиатуры:
Старт - Enter
Передвижение - WASD или стрелочки
Копка A - Z
Кнопка B - B
Похищение документа - пробел
Перемещение прицелом и выстрел - мышка

author: {'steamid': '76561198071703209', 'num_games_owned': 1462, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1477365305}
review:
Nota: obtube mi copia del juego de parte de los desarrolladores con el objetivo de hacer una reseña, aún así esto no afecta de ningún modo mi opinión sobre el juego.

Party Saboteurs es un juego con un concepto simple que nos recuerda a Spy Party, manejas a un espía y a un francotirador al mismo tiempo, tu objetivo será eliminar a los espías enemigos o conseguir los archivos secretos antes que los demás jugadores.

La jugabilidad es simple aunque difícil de dominar y el único punto en contra es que se requiere jugar con mandos de Xbox obligatoriamente (o usar algún programa de terceros para utilizar un mando genérico)

Graficamente está muy bien hecho tiene un estilo de 16 bits que queda muy bien con la temática, además me sorprendió el hecho de ser un juego hecho en Unity, puesto que no usa los recursos comunes que se encuentran en juegos desarrollados con esta plataforma normalmente.

Por ahora el único punto negativo que le encuentro es la falta de online, aunque los desarrolladores planean añadirlo a futuro.

A continuación una reseña en video donde muestro y explico cada parte del juego: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yEKNzVCfl4Y

author: {'steamid': '76561197972324850', 'num_games_owned': 874, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1528167206}
review:
If you like Thief Town or Hidden in Plain Sight then this game will be great for you. You each play as both a spy and a sniper. Basically the left side of your controller controls the spy and the right side controls the sniper. You are tying to perform tasks as a spy while at the same time trying to find and kill other spies with the sniper. It sounds a little more confusing than it is. 

Bottom line- Its a fun LOCAL (Online says its coming soon) multiplayer game. Fun if you have some roommates you dont mind destroying. Its early access so there are a couple bugs here and there and im sure there will be plenty of additions to the game as time goes on.
